SELECT CMNY_NO ,BOARD_CODE ,CMNY_NAME ,CMNY_TOP ,CMNY_INTRO ,OPEN_DAY ,CLOSE_DAY ,MEMBER_COUNT ,CMNY_RETURN ,CMNY_APPROVAL ,CMNY_STATUS ,CMNY_IMG_PATH FROM community WHERE CMNY_NO = #{cmnyNo}

SELECT cm.CMNY_MEM_NO ,cm.CMNY_NO ,cm.EMP_NO ,cm.JOIN_DAY ,cm.QUIT_DAY ,cm.CMNY_ENABLED ,cm.CMNY_MEM_APPROVAL ,cm.CMNY_MEM_RETURN ,cm.CMNY_TOP_YN ,e.emp_name ,d.dept_name ,(SELECT common_code_name FROM common_code WHERE common_code_group_id = 100 AND common_code = e.position_code) AS position_name FROM community_mem cm JOIN employee e ON cm.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO JOIN dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE cm.CMNY_NO = #{cmnyNo} AND cm.CMNY_ENABLED = '1' ORDER BY CMNY_TOP_YN desc
mapper.update: UPDATE community_mem SET CMNY_ENABLED = '0' WHERE CMNY_NO = #{cmnyNo} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}

mapper.update: UPDATE community SET CMNY_STATUS = '0' WHERE CMNY_NO = #{cmnyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.CMNY_NO , c.CMNY_NAME , c.CMNY_TOP , c.CMNY_INTRO , c.OPEN_DAY , c.CLOSE_DAY , c.MEMBER_COUNT , c.CMNY_RETURN , c.CMNY_APPROVAL , c.CMNY_STATUS , c.CMNY_IMG_PATH , cm.EMP_NO , cm.JOIN_DAY , cm.QUIT_DAY , cm.CMNY_ENABLED , cm.CMNY_MEM_APPROVAL , cm.CMNY_MEM_RETURN , cm.CMNY_TOP_YN FROM community_mem cm INNER JOIN community c ON cm.CMNY_NO = c.CMNY_NO WHERE cm.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND cm.CMNY_ENABLED = '1' AND c.CMNY_STATUS = '1' ORDER BY CMNY_TOP_YN desc
